name: nodemailer-wellknown
readme:
# Nodemailer Well-Known Services

Returns SMTP configuration for well-known services

## Usage

Install with npm

    npm install nodemailer-wellknown

Require in your script

```javascript
var wellknown = require('nodemailer-wellknown');
```

Resolve SMTP settings

```javascript
var config = wellknown('Gmail');
// { host: 'smtp.gmail.com',
//   port: 465,
//   secure: true }
```

## Supported services

  * AOL
  * DynectEmail
  * FastMail
  * Gmail
  * Godaddy
  * GodaddyAsia
  * GodaddyEurope
  * hot.ee
  * Hotmail
  * iCloud
  * mail.ee
  * Mail.ru
  * Mailgun
  * Mailjet
  * Mandrill
  * Postmark
  * QQ
  * QQex
  * SendCloud
  * SendGrid
  * SES
  * Yahoo
  * Yandex
  * Zoho
